title: Crossbow Shop (Keldagrim)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Crossbow Shop in Keldagrim Palace is a Crossbow stall owned by Hirko that sells crossbows and crossbow components like other crossbow shops. It is located in the eastern side of the palace. By talking directly to Hirko, one may also purchase a Bolt pouch.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Crossbow Shop (Keldagrim)
Crossbow Shop
Released31 July 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationKeldagrim Palace
OwnerHirko
SpecialtyArchery shop
Location

The Crossbow Shop in Keldagrim Palace is a Crossbow stall owned by Hirko that sells crossbows and crossbow components like other crossbow shops. It is located in the eastern side of the palace. By talking directly to Hirko, one may also purchase a Bolt pouch.

Stock[edit | edit source]

Sells at: 300.0% • Buys at: 60.0% • Change per: 2.0%
